channel.title: [TUT] how to get free games, programs, serials and more!
channel.description:
a great file sharing program, not as fast as limewire but has WAY more sources and downloads [url=http://www.emule-project.org]www.emule-project.org[/url]
[u]Games[/u] Extra programs: Isobuster (just google search it) 1. first we need to know which game we want (e.g. Halo) 2. now open eMule and click connect [IMG]http://img293.imageshack.us/img293/5594/emuletut1np5.jpg[/img]
3. next click search and put the type of file you are searching for as cd-image (make sure you're searching on the Kad network too)
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img237.imageshack.us/img237/5869/emuletut2pv8.jpg[/img][/URL]
4.search for <insert game name here> and click availibility to sort them by amount of downloads(therefore meaning more reliable and faster to download ;) )
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img136.imageshack.us/img136/3518/emuletut3ed4.jpg[/img][/URL]
5.double click the first few files to download them (make sure they have (pc) or (pc game) or [PC GAME] st the start), click transfer (at the top) to view their progress
6.once the download is done go to C:/---->Program Files---->emule----->incoming and double click the download (that should open it with isobuster) 7.then highlight all the files right click and extract them to a folder of your choice 8.then run the setup.exe in the folder 9.once setup is complete apply a crack and tadaaaa! a game for free!
other parts will come soon

item.title: [TUT] how to get free games, programs, serials and more!
item.dc:creator: @Vahuka Vahuka
item.description:
@Vahuka wrote:

a great file sharing program, not as fast as limewire but has WAY more sources and downloads
www.emule-project.org

Games
Extra programs: Isobuster (just google search it)

  1. first we need to know which game we want (e.g. Halo)

  2. now open eMule and click connect

  3. next click search and put the type of file you are searching for as cd-image (make sure you’re searching on the Kad network too)

4.search for and click availibility to sort them by amount of downloads(therefore meaning more reliable and faster to download )

5.double click the first few files to download them (make sure they have (pc) or (pc game) or [PC GAME] st the start), click transfer (at the top) to view their progress

6.once the download is done go to C:/---->Program Files---->emule----->incoming and double click the download (that should open it with isobuster)
7.then highlight all the files right click and extract them to a folder of your choice
8.then run the setup.exe in the folder
9.once setup is complete apply a crack and tadaaaa! a game for free!

other parts will come soon

Read full topic
